name: Spooky Midnight Snack
description:
A short game about going for a midnight snack in a haunted house.

Controls: 

  • Up/W to turn torch on
  • Release to turn off

Shine your torch at the ghosts before they get you! The torch has limited batteries, which are depleted when it's turned on, and restored when off.

My first ever game, created for the 2021 Nokia 3310 Jam using the DragonRuby Game Toolkit. Thanks to the DragonRuby Discord for your help, and to Trix for the sound effects!
